channel.title: Academic Integrity on Afnan Alabdulwahab

item.title: The Turing Test: Detecting LLM-Generated Content
item.description: A research project exploring methods for detecting AI-generated text, benchmarking existing detection models, and developing a robust classifier to distinguish human-written and LLM-generated content.
